Abyss Walker.card_desc: [Nether Step] Nether Step heals you for {scale=40|40} Health.

Abyssal Touch.card_desc: [Defiance] Defiance reduces the cooldown of Nether Step by {scale=1|1}s if it hits a champion.

Cursed Revolver.card_desc: [Weapon] Your Revolver becomes automatic with a slightly lower fire rate and increased damage.

Defiant Fist.card_desc: [Defiance] Successful hits with Revolver increase the damage of your next Defiance by 15% up to 100%.

Disrupt.card_desc: [Reversal] Reduce the cooldown of Reversal by {scale=1.2|1.2}s.

Elusive.card_desc: [Nether Step] Gain {scale=10|10}% Movement speed for 3s after using Nether Step.

Equivalent Exchange.card_desc: [Reversal] Heal for {scale=10|10}% of the Damage absorbed by Reversal.

Featherweight.card_desc: [Armor] Gain {scale=6|6}% Damage Reduction while using Drift.

Godslayer.card_desc: [Reversal] Reversal now always fires back and deals a minimum of 800 damage.

Marksman.card_desc: [Defiance] If Defiance hits a Champion it generates {scale=1|1} Ammo.

Power of the Abyss.card_desc: [Reversal] Hitting a target with Reversal reduces the Cooldown of Nether Step by {scale=20|20}%

Seething Hatred.card_desc: [Weapon] Hitting an enemy reduces the cooldown of Reversal by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Sleight of Hand.card_desc: [Nether Step] Using Nether Step generates {scale=1|1} Ammo.

Spiteful.card_desc: [Defiance] Killing enemies with Defiance generates {scale=3|3}% ultimate charge.

Through the Warp.card_desc: [Nether Step] Increase the distance of each Nether Step dash by {scale=10|10}%

Vengeance.card_desc: [Defiance] Killing an enemy with Defiance grants you {scale=200|200} Health.

Watchful.card_desc: [Armor] Getting an elimination reduces all active cooldowns by {scale=10|10}%

Abgrundwandler.card_desc: [Höllenschritt] Mit jedem Höllenschritt-Sprint wirst du {scale=40|40} LP geheilt.

Bosheit.card_desc: [Missachtung] Kills mit Missachtung laden deine Überkraft um {scale=3|3}% auf.

Brodelnder Hass.card_desc: [Waffe] Waffentreffer reduzieren die Abklingzeit von Umschwung um {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Durch den Warp.card_desc: [Höllenschritt] Erhöht die Weite jedes Höllenschritt-Sprints um {scale=10|10}%.

Eiserne Faust.card_desc: [Missachtung] Treffer mit dem Revolver erhöhen den Schaden beim nächsten Einsatz von Missachtung um 15% bis 100%.

Fairer Tausch.card_desc: [Umschwung] Du wirst um {scale=10|10}% des durch Umschwung absorbierten Schadens geheilt.

Federgewicht.card_desc: [Rüstung] Während des Driftens wird erlittener Schaden um {scale=6|6}% reduziert.

Gottt\u00f6ter.card_desc: [Umschwung] Umschwung feuert immer zurück und verursacht mindestens 800 Schaden.

Kunstst\u00fcck.card_desc: [Höllenschritt] Die Aktivierung von Höllenschritt erzeugt {scale=1|1} Munition.

Macht des Abgrunds.card_desc: [Umschwung] Treffer mit Umschwung reduzieren die Abklingzeit von Höllenschritt um {scale=20|20}%.

Rache.card_desc: [Missachtung] Tötest du einen Gegner mit Missachtung, wirst du {scale=200|200} LP geheilt.

St\u00f6ren.card_desc: [Umschwung] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Umschwung um {scale=1.2|1.2}s.

Tiefe Ber\u00fchrung.card_desc: [Missachtung] Treffer mit Missachtung reduzieren die Abklingzeit von Höllenschritt um {scale=1|1}s.

Tr\u00fcgerisch.card_desc: [Höllenschritt] Erhöht dein Lauftempo nach Verwendung von Höllenschritt 3s lang um {scale=10|10}%.

Verfluchte Waffe.card_desc: [Waffe] Dein Revolver feuert automatisch und verfügt über eine leicht verringerte Feuerrate und erhöhten Schaden.

Wachsam.card_desc: [Rüstung] Eliminierungen reduzieren alle aktiven Abklingzeiten um {scale=10|10}%.

Zeit schinden.card_desc: [Umschwung] Die Aktivierung von Umschwung erzeugt {scale=1|1} Munition.

D\u00e9gaine \u00e9clair.card_desc: [Arme] Votre vitesse de rechargement augmente de {scale=5|5}%.

D\u00e9icide.card_desc: [Inversion] Inversion s'achève toujours par un tir de 800 dégâts au minimum.

\u00c9change \u00e9quitable.card_desc: [Inversion] {scale=10|10}% des dégâts absorbés par Inversion sont convertis en soin.

Haine vivace.card_desc: [Arme] Toucher un ennemi réduit le temps de recharge d'Inversion de {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Insaisissable.card_desc: [Marche infernale] Pendant 3s après Marche infernale, votre vitesse augmente de {scale=10|10}%.

Malfaisance.card_desc: [Bravade] Chaque exécution avec Bravade donne {scale=3|3}% de charge d'ultime.

Marcheur abyssal.card_desc: [Marche infernale] Marche infernale vous redonne {scale=40|40} PV.

Par-del\u00e0 le vortex.card_desc: [Marche infernale] La distance de chaque ruée de Marche infernale augmente de {scale=10|10}%.

Poids plume.card_desc: [Armure] Quand vous planez, vous subissez {scale=6|6}% de dégâts en moins.

Poing rebelle.card_desc: [Bravade] Chaque tir de revolver réussi augmente de 15% les dégâts de la prochaine Bravade, jusqu'à un bonus de 100%.

Puissance abyssale.card_desc: [Inversion] Toucher une cible avec Inversion réduit le temps de recharge de Marche infernale de {scale=20|20}%.

Revolver maudit.card_desc: [Arme] Le Revolver est une arme automatique. Il inflige plus de dégâts mais sa cadence de tir diminue.

Tireur d'\u00e9lite.card_desc: [Bravade] Si elle touche un champion, Bravade rend {scale=1|1} munition(s).

Toucher abyssal.card_desc: [Bravade] Chaque Bravade réussie réduit le temps de recharge de Marche infernale de {scale=1|1}s.

Vengeance.card_desc: [Bravade] Chaque exécution avec Bravade vous redonne {scale=200|200} PV.

Vigilance.card_desc: [Armure] Chaque élimination réduit les temps de recharge en cours de {scale=10|10}%.

\u56de\u6eaf.card_desc: [黑暗反射] 激活技能可以获得{scale=1|1}发弹药

\u590d\u4ec7.card_desc: [断罪重击] 断罪重击造成击杀时回复{scale=200|200}点生命

\u5f11\u795e\u6076\u9b54.card_desc: [黑暗反射] 黑暗反射必会造成至少800点反弹伤害

\u5feb\u624b.card_desc: [暗影步] 使用暗影步可以获得{scale=1|1} 发弹药

\u65ad\u7f6a\u94c1\u62f3.card_desc: [断罪重击] 普通攻击每次命中都会提高断罪重击的伤害10%，最高可提高100%

\u6c79\u6d8c\u4e4b\u6012.card_desc: [武器] 武器命中敌人将减少黑暗反射的冷却时间{scale=0.5|0.5}秒

\u6df1\u6e0a\u4e4b\u529b.card_desc: [黑暗反射] 使用黑暗反射命中目标会降低暗影步{scale=20|20}%的冷却时间。

\u6df1\u6e0a\u4e4b\u89e6.card_desc: [断罪重击] 断罪重击命中敌人后会减少{scale=2|2}秒暗影步的冷却时间

\u6df1\u6e0a\u884c\u8005.card_desc: [暗影步] 使用暗影步会回复{scale=40|40} 点生命值

\u730e\u5934\u67aa\u624b.card_desc: [武器] 弹药增加2发，爆头伤害提高50%

\u74e6\u89e3.card_desc: [黑暗反射] 黑暗反射的冷却时间降低{scale=1.2|1.2}秒

\u76f8\u4f4d\u8f6c\u79fb.card_desc: [暗影步] 增加暗影步的冲刺距离{scale=10|10}%

\u795e\u51fa\u9b3c\u6ca1.card_desc: [暗影步] 使用暗影步后的3秒内移动速度提升{scale=10|10}%

\u795e\u5c04\u624b.card_desc: [断罪重击] 断罪重击命中敌人后，返还{scale=1|1}发弹药

\u7b49\u4ef7\u4ea4\u6362.card_desc: [黑暗反射] 黑暗反射吸收伤害的{scale=10|10}%转为对你的治疗。

\u8511\u89c6.card_desc: [断罪重击] 断罪重击命中减少敌方{scale=15|15}%治疗效果，持续3秒

\u8f7b\u91cf\u7ea7.card_desc: [护甲] 浮空期间获得{scale=6|6}%伤害减免

\u9c9c\u8840\u56db\u6e85.card_desc: [武器] 参与击败会减少所有技能{scale=10|10}%的冷却时间

Abyssal Touch.card_desc: [Defiance] Defiance reduces healing by {5}% with a maximum of 3 stacks.

Continuation.card_desc: [Nether Step] You may re-activate Nether Step a third time, and gain {25} Health each time you dash.

Equivalent Exchange.card_desc: [Reversal] Heal for {20}% of the damage absorbed from Reversal

Featherweight.card_desc: [Armor] Increase your air control while drifting by {25}%

Fight or Flight.card_desc: [Accursed Arm] You may use Nether Step during Accursed Arm, and lower the Cooldown of Nether Step by {25}% when Accursed Arm ends

Heads Will Roll.card_desc: [Weapon] Hitting an enemy in the head deals {5}% more damage

Marksman.card_desc: [Defiance] Hitting all 3 Defiance shots grants you {1} ammo.

Quick Draw.card_desc: [Nether Step] +{8}% Attack Speed for 4s upon activating Nether Step

Seething Hatred.card_desc: [Weapon] Hitting an enemy reduces the cooldown of Reversal by {0.5}s.

Sleight of Hand.card_desc: [Nether Step] After using Nether Step, refill {3} ammo

Through the Warp.card_desc: [Nether Step] Increase the distance of each Nether Step dash by {10}%

Vengeance.card_desc: [Reversal] Reversal no longer has a damage limit and deals an additional {8}% of the damage absorbed

Watchful.card_desc: [Weapon] Hitting an enemy in the head reveals them to you for {1}s.

Asesino de dioses.card_desc: [Reflectar] Ahora Reflectar siempre devuelve los disparos e inflige un mínimo de 800  PS de daño.

C\u00f3lera.card_desc: [Arma] Si alcanzas a un enemigo, la recarga de Reflectar se reduce en {scale=0.5|0.5} s.

Conseguir Tiempo.card_desc: [Reflectar] Al activar Reflectar, recargas {scale=1|1} de munición.

Distorsi\u00f3n.card_desc: [Paso inferior] Aumentas la distancia de avance de cada paso inferior un {scale=10|10}%.

Equidad.card_desc: [Reflectar] Reflectar te cura un {scale=10|10}% del daño recibido.

Evasivo.card_desc: [Paso inferior] Ganas un {scale=10|10}% de velocidad de movimiento durante 3s después de usar Paso inferior.

Mal\u00e9volo.card_desc: [Desafío] Eliminar enemigos con Desafío carga un {scale=3|3}% tu habilidad definitiva.

Ojo atento.card_desc: [Armadura] Al realizar una eliminación reduce todas las recargas activas un {scale=10|10}%.

Perturbar.card_desc: [Reflectar] Su recarga se reduce en {scale=1.2|1.2} s.

Peso pluma.card_desc: [Armadura] Obtén un {scale=6|6}% de reducción de daño mientras usas Flotar.

Poder del abismo.card_desc: [Reflectar] Al alcanzar a un objetivo con Reflectar, la recarga de Paso inferior se reduce un {scale=20|20}%

Prestidigitaci\u00f3n.card_desc: [Paso inferior] Al usar Paso inferior, recargas {scale=1|1} de munición.

Pu\u00f1o Desafiante.card_desc: [Desafío] Los ataques exitosos con Revólver aumentan el daño de tu próximo Desafío un 15%, hasta un máximo del 100%.

Rev\u00f3lver maldito.card_desc: [Arma] Revólver se vuelve automático con una cadencia de tiro ligeramente más baja y más daño.

Roce abisal.card_desc: [Desafío] Reduce la recarga de Paso inferior en {scale=1|1} s cada vez que alcanza a un campeón.

Tirador.card_desc: [Desafío] Recuperas {scale=1|1} de munición si alcanza a un campeón con Desafío.

Venganza.card_desc: [Desafío] Eliminar a un enemigo con Desafío te otorga {scale=200|200} PS.

Agressivo.card_desc: [Desafiador] Matar inimigos com o Desafiador carrega {scale=3|3}% da suprema.

Andarilho do Abismo.card_desc: [Passo Infernal] Passo Infernal cura em {scale=40|40} a sua vida.

Bom de Mira.card_desc: [Desafiador] Se acertar um Campeão, Desafiador gera {scale=1|1} de munição.

Disruptivo.card_desc: [Reversão] Reduz o intervalo da Reversão em {scale=1.2|1.2}s.

Distor\u00e7\u00e3o.card_desc: [Passo Infernal] Aumenta em {scale=10|10}% a distância de cada arremetida do Passo Infernal.

Evasivo.card_desc: [Passo Infernal] Ganha {scale=10|10}% mais velocidade de movimento por 3s depois de usar o Passo Infernal.

Matador de Deuses.card_desc: [Reversão] Reversão agora sempre dispara de volta e causa no mínimo 800 de dano.

\u00d3dio Total.card_desc: [Arma] Atingir um inimigo reduz o intervalo da Reversão em {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Passe de M\u00e1gica.card_desc: [Passo Infernal] Usar o Passo Infernal recupera {scale=1|1} de munição.

Peso Pena.card_desc: [Armor] Recebe {scale=6|6}% de redução de dano enquanto estiver usando o Passo Infernal.

Poder do Abismo.card_desc: [Reversão] Atingir um alvo com a Reversão reduz o intervalo do Passo Infernal em {scale=20|20}%.

Prontid\u00e3o.card_desc: [Armadura] Eliminar um inimigo reduz em {scale=10|10}% todos os intervalos ativos.

Punho Desafiador.card_desc: [Desafiador] Cada tiro que acertar com seu revólver aumenta o dano do seu próximo Desafiador em 15%, até um máximo de 100%.

Rev\u00f3lver Amaldi\u00e7oado.card_desc: [Arma] Seu Revólver fica automático, com uma taxa de disparo um pouco menor, mas com dano aumentado.

Saque R\u00e1pido.card_desc: [Arma] Aumenta a velocidade de recarga da arma em {scale=5|5}%.

Toque Abissal.card_desc: [Desafiador] Desafiador reduz o intervalo do Passo Infernal em {scale=1|1}s se acertar um Campeão.

Troca Equivalente.card_desc: [Reversão] Cura {scale=10|10}% do dano absorvido pela Reversão.

Vingan\u00e7a.card_desc: [Desafiador] Matar um inimigo com Desafiador te cura {scale=200|200} de vida.

\u0411\u0434\u0438\u0442\u0435\u043b\u04.card_desc: [Броня] Устранения сокращают текущую перезарядку способностей на {scale=10|10}%.

\u0411\u043e\u0433\u043e\u0443\u0431\u04.card_desc: [Инверсия] Инверсия теперь всегда производит ответный выстрел и наносит не менее 800 ед. урона.

\u0412\u043e\u0437\u043c\u0435\u0437\u04.card_desc: [Неповиновение] При убийстве врага с помощью Неповиновения вы получаете {scale=200|200} ед. здоровья.

\u0418\u0441\u043a\u0440\u0438\u0432\u04.card_desc: [Адская походка] Дальность каждого рывка Адской походки увеличивается на {scale=10|10}%.

\u041a\u0430\u043a \u043f\u0435\u0440\u0.card_desc: [Броня] Во время использования Торможения вы получаете на {scale=6|6}% меньше урона.

\u041a\u0430\u0441\u0430\u043d\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Неповиновение] Попадание по чемпиону Неповиновением сокращает перезарядку Адской походки на {scale=1|1} с.

\u041a\u0438\u043f\u044f\u0449\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Попадание по врагу сокращает перезарядку Инверсии на {scale=0.5|0.5} с.

\u041a\u0443\u043b\u0430\u043a \u043d\u0.card_desc: [Неповиновение] Попадания из револьвера увеличивают урон при следующем использовании Неповиновения на 15-100%.

\u041b\u043e\u0432\u043a\u043e\u0441\u04.card_desc: [Адская походка] Адская походка генерирует {scale=1|1} ед. боеприпасов.

\u041c\u0435\u0442\u043a\u0438\u0439 \u0.card_desc: [Неповиновение] Попадание в чемпиона Неповиновением генерирует {scale=1|1} ед. боеприпасов.

\u041d\u0435\u043f\u0440\u0438\u044f\u04.card_desc: [Неповиновение] Убийства врагов Неповиновением заряжают суперудар на {scale=3|3}%.

\u041d\u0435\u0443\u043b\u043e\u0432\u04.card_desc: [Адская походка] Ваша скорость передвижения после использования Адской походки увеличивается на {scale=10|10}% на 3 с.

\u041f\u0440\u043e\u043a\u043b\u044f\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Ваш револьвер становится автоматическим, его скорострельность немного уменьшается, и он наносит больше урона.

\u0420\u0430\u0432\u043d\u043e\u0446\u04.card_desc: [Инверсия] Вы исцеляетесь на {scale=10|10}% от урона, поглощенного во время Инверсии.

\u0421\u0438\u043b\u0430 \u0431\u0435\u0.card_desc: [Инверсия] Попадание по цели Инверсией сокращает перезарядку Адской походки на {scale=20|20}%.

\u0428\u0430\u0433\u0438 \u0432 \u0431\u.card_desc: [Адская походка] Адская походка исцеляет вас на {scale=40|40} ед.

Czujno\u015b\u0107.card_desc: [Pancerz] Eliminacje skracają aktywne czasy odnowienia o {scale=10|10}%.

Kipiel z\u0142o\u015bci.card_desc: [Broń] Trafienie wroga skraca czas odnowienia Inwersji o {scale=0.5|0.5} s.

Kuglarstwo.card_desc: [Mroczny sprint] Mroczny sprint generuje {scale=1|1} szt. amunicji.

Mroczna moc.card_desc: [Inwersja] Trafienie wroga Inwersją skraca czas odnowienia Mrocznego sprintu o {scale=20|20}%.

Mroczny dotyk.card_desc: [Przekora] Przekora skraca czas odnowienia Mrocznego sprintu o {scale=1|1} s, jeśli trafi czempiona.

Nieuchwytny.card_desc: [Mroczny sprint] Zwiększa szybkość ruchu o {scale=10|10}% na 3 s po użyciu Mrocznego sprintu.

Poprzez portal.card_desc: [Mroczny sprint] Zwiększa zasięg każdego Mrocznego sprintu o {scale=10|10}%.

Przekl\u0119ty rewolwer.card_desc: [Broń] Broń przełącza się w tryb automatyczny z niższą częstotliwością strzałów i zwiększonymi obrażeniami.

Sprawiedliwa wymiana.card_desc: [Inwersja] Leczy cię o {scale=10|10}% obrażeń pochłoniętych przez Inwersję.

Strzelec wyborowy.card_desc: [Przekora] Przekora generuje {scale=1|1} szt. amunicji, jeśli trafi czempiona.

Waga pi\u00f3rkowa.card_desc: [Pancerz] Przyznaje {scale=6|6}% redukcji obrażeń podczas opadania po skorzystaniu z Mrocznego sprintu.

Wzniesiona pi\u0119\u015b\u0107.card_desc: [Przekora] Trafienia rewolwerem zwiększają obrażenia zadawane przez Przekorę o 15% (maks. o 100%).

Zab\u00f3jca bog\u00f3w.card_desc: [Inwersja] Inwersja zawsze odpowiada na atak i zadaje min. 800 obrażeń.

Zak\u0142\u00f3cenie.card_desc: [Inwersja] Skraca czas odnowienia Inwersji o {scale=1.2|1.2} s.

Adil Takas.card_desc: [Geri Çevirme] Geri Çevirme ile emilen Hasarın %{scale=10|10} kadarı iyileş.

B\u00f6l.card_desc: [Geri Çevirme] Geri Çevirme'nin Bekleme Süresini {scale=1.2|1.2} sn azalt.

C\u00fcretkar Yumruk.card_desc: [Gözdağı] Altıpatlar ile yaptığın başarı vuruşlar bir sonraki Gözdağı'nın hasarını %100'e kadar %15'er artırır.

El \u00c7abuklu\u011fu.card_desc: [Cehennem Adımı] Cehennem Adımı'nı kullanmak {scale=1|1} Cephane oluşturur.

Ge\u00e7idin \u0130\u00e7inden.card_desc: [Cehennem Adımı] Her Cehennem Adımı atlayışının mesafesini %{scale=10|10} artır.

\u0130ntikam.card_desc: [Gözdağı] Gözdağı ile bir düşman katlettiğinde {scale=200|200} Can kazanırsın.

Kaynayan Kin.card_desc: [Silah] Bir düşmanı vurmak, Geri Çevirme'nin Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.5|0.5} sn azaltır.

Kaypak.card_desc: [Cehennem Adımı] Cehennem Adımı'nı kullandıktan sonra 3 sn boyunca %{scale=10|10} Hareket Hızı kazan.

Kindar.card_desc: [Gözdağı] Gözdağı ile düşmanları katletmek ultiyi %{scale=3|3} doldurur.

Lanetli Alt\u0131patlar.card_desc: [Silah] Altıpatlar'ın otomatikleşerek biraz daha düşük atış hızına ve daha fazla hasara sahip olur.

Ni\u015fanc\u0131.card_desc: [Gözdağı] Gözdağı bir Şampiyona isabet ederse {scale=1|1} Cephane oluşturur.

Tanr\u0131 Avc\u0131s\u0131.card_desc: [Geri Çevirme] Geri Çevirme artık hep geri ateş açacak ve minimum 800 hasar verecek.

Tetikte.card_desc: [Zırh] Bir saf dışı bırakma yapınca tüm aktif Bekleme Süreleri %{scale=10|10} azalır.

U\u00e7urum Dokunu\u015fu.card_desc: [Gözdağı] Gözdağı bir şampiyona isabet ederse Cehennem Adımı'nın Bekleme Süresini {scale=1|1} sn azaltır.

U\u00e7urum Gezgini.card_desc: [Cehennem Adımı] Cehennem Adımı, seni {scale=40|40} Can iyileştirir.

U\u00e7urumun G\u00fcc\u00fc.card_desc: [Geri Çevirme] Geri Çevirme ile bir hedefe vurmak Cehennem Adımı'nın Bekleme Süresini %{scale=20|20} azaltır.

Zaman \u00c7alma.card_desc: [Geri Çevirme] Geri Çevirme'yi etkinleştirmek {scale=1|1} cephane oluşturur.
